CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Traffic Conversion Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Traffic Conversion Rate is Self-Service Resolution Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Traffic Conversion Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Traffic Conversion Rate is Repurchase Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Traffic Conversion Rate, is the point for Martin Group inside or outside the point for Butler-Greene?
SRP.A: On the Traffic Conversion Rate, the point for Martin Group is inside the point for Butler-Greene.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Repurchase Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Martin Group?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Repurchase Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Self-Service Resolution Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Repurchase Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Repurchase Rate, label {Butler-Greene} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Member Activity Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Member Activity Rate, label {Martin Group} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of Butler-Greene on the Traffic Conversion Rate in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Butler-Greene on the Safety dimension is {100}.

VE.Q: What is the value of Butler-Greene on the Self-Service Resolution Rate in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Butler-Greene on the Safety dimension is {40}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label Martin Group across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of Martin Group across all dimensions is {63}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label Butler-Greene across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of Butler-Greene across all dimensions is {63}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Self-Service Resolution Rate
SC.A: The average value of Self-Service Resolution Rate is {34.5}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Butler-Greene
SC.A: The average value of Butler-Greene is {72.0}.

NF.Q: For Butler-Greene in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores below 52? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.

NC.Q: For Martin Group, which dimension has a higher score: Repurchase Rate or Member Activity Rate?
NC.A: {Repurchase Rate} has a higher score than Member Activity Rate for Martin Group.

NC.Q: On Self-Service Resolution Rate, which label has a higher score: Butler-Greene or the Martin Group?
NC.A: {Butler-Greene} has a higher score on Self-Service Resolution Rate compared to Martin Group.

NC.Q: On Self-Service Resolution Rate, which label has a higher score: Butler-Greene or the Martin Group?
NC.A: {Butler-Greene} has a higher score on Self-Service Resolution Rate compared to Martin Group.

NC.Q: For Martin Group, which dimension has a higher score: Self-Service Resolution Rate or Member Activity Rate or Traffic Conversion Rate?
NC.A: {Member Activity Rate} has a higher score for Martin Group.

MSR.Q: For Butler-Greene, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Butler-Greene most needs to improve its {Self-Service Resolution Rate}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Butler-Greene}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {Martin Group}.
